system.summary: Reduced recoil penalty for Burst Fire
system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.WZgKEHaJW8emVPBl]{Personal Firearms Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.X1Qj8vIUDMDE4iQ9]{Autofire Proficiency}

Benefit

The characterâ€™s Total Recoil Penalty is reduced by 2 when performing burst fire attacks. This reduction is calculated after the Attack Recoil Penalty and the Caliber Recoil Penalty.
